name: Richard H. Fine People’s Clinic
description: Richard H. Fine People’s Clinic (RFPC), formally known as GMC or the General Medicine Clinic, provides comprehensive, high-quality primary care services to patients who are 18 years of age or older. The medical providers are Nurse Practitioners, Internal Medicine Residents in training, and UCSF faculty. Appointments at the Richard H. Fine People’s Clinic (RFPC) are available Monday through Friday, and there are appointments during the evening four days a week. They offer a broad range of service
